title: Relationship between PL and RGDP along AD curve

content.question: Which of the following best explains the relationship between the price level and real output along the aggregate demand curve?

choices.label: A higher price level increases the value of real assets.
A higher price level increases the relative price of imports.
A lower price level reduces the real interest rate and increases investment.
A higher price level increases consumers’ wealth and consumption.
A lower price level reduces consumers’ confidence and consumption.

content.answer: A lower price level reduces the real interest rate and increases investment.
